query:
ALTER TABLE market_reports 
ADD COLUMN btc_state VARCHAR(10) DEFAULT NULL,
ADD COLUMN btc_liquidity_tag VARCHAR(20) DEFAULT NULL,
ADD COLUMN btc_confidence VARCHAR(20) DEFAULT NULL,
ADD COLUMN btc_evidence_json JSON DEFAULT NULL;
